alert.note: Alert for Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon; Southern Blue Mountains of Oregon; Wallowa County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 03 at 9:05PM PDT until November 04 at 11:00AM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM PDT FRIDAY ABOVE 3000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 3000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches for Wallowa County, 6 to 10 inches for the northern Blue Mountains, and 5 to 7 inches for the southern Blue Mountains. * WHERE...In Oregon, Wallowa County, Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon, and Southern Blue Mountains of Oregon. In Washington, Northwest Blue Mountains. * WHEN...Until 11 AM PDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1, or by visiting online at https://tripcheck.com for Oregon or https://wsdot.com/travel for Washington.

area.areaDesc: Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon; Southern Blue Mountains of Oregon; Wallowa County
